Springfield.WLFZ:
WLFZ is a country music radio station licensed to and serving the Springfield, Illinois market.
Formerly the home of Oldies-formatted "Cool 101.9", parent company Saga Communications changed the format of the 101.9 frequency on October 2, 2013. The Oldies format, as well as the 101.9 frequency's former WQQL-FM call letters, were moved to 93.9 and rebranded as "Cool 93.9".
